name: Craft Wars (AMDASK)
description:
Craft Wars is about players trying to destroy the tiles underneath the other players and make them fall off the arena. The last player standing wins the match.  

Craft Wars is still under development and you may encounter bugs while playing. If you encounter any bugs, please let us know by leaving a comment.

This project is a continuation of 'Craft Wars - ludum dare' which was created for ludum dare 42.
